task.prompt: Let point $O$ be the origin of a three-dimensional coordinate system, and let points $A,$ $B,$ and $C$ be located on the positive $x,$ $y,$ and $z$ axes, respectively.  If $OA = \sqrt[4]{75}$ and $\angle BAC = 30^\circ,$ then compute the area of triangle $ABC.$
